name: Gelatinous Cube
description: A large, transparent ooze in the shape of a perfect cube that slowly moves through dungeons, dissolving and consuming organic material.
memorable: Its nearly invisible form makes it a deadly ambush predator that can engulf and digest living creatures.
goals: To consume any organic matter that enters its space.
relations: Often found in old dungeons, keeps corridors clean of debris and bodies.
strengths: High hit points and strong ability to engage multiple foes through engulfing attacks.
weaknesses: Low Armor Class and very slow movement speed make it vulnerable to ranged attacks.
attacks: Engulfs creatures to restrain and deal ongoing acid damage, along with a melee attack using its pseudopod.
most_powerful_ability: Engulf, allowing it to consume or restrain multiple creatures.
senses: Has blindsight out to 60 feet, allowing it to perceive its surroundings without sight.
skills: Its passive Perception is low, making it unlikely to notice stealthy creatures.
additional_information: Immunity to conditions like blinded, charmed, deafened, and frightened.
Can move engulfed creatures to absorb damage directed at it.
Takes disadvantage on attack rolls in sunlight.
Effectively invisible when motionless, making it a surprise threat.
Does not require air or sleep, making it active during long encounters.
test_queries: transparent cube that deals acid damage
